#Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

#Data
```{r}
Aantrekking_data <- read.csv("./dashboard/input/maatschappelijke_draagkracht/F14_2_data.csv",
                         sep = ",",
                         header = TRUE)

```

#Grafiek
```{r}
Impacts_stakeholders$Antwoord_reclass <- factor(Impacts_stakeholders$Antwoord_reclass , 
                                    levels = c('Groot', 'Klein'))

plot_aantrekking <- ggplot(data = Aantrekking_data,
                                        aes(x = Sector,
                                            y = percentage,
                                            fill = Antwoord_reclass)) +
                                  geom_bar(stat = "identity", 
                                           position = "stack") +
  facet_grid( ~ Year)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) 

plot_aantrekking
```
